text: Hi folks, when typing `using MyDevPackage` , does Julia load the latest version of this package, or does it keep the version from the time that I added in through the package manager? Thank you

elements.text: , does Julia load the latest version of this package, or does it keep the version from the time that I added in through the package manager? Thank you

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
And when, I stage & commit through _git_, shouldn't the latest changes be available without re-adding the package?

elements.text: And when, I stage & commit through
, shouldn't the latest changes be available without re-adding the package?

text: You can track a branch (e.g. `]add MyDevPackage#main`) and use `]up MyDevPackage` to get the latest commit
